Download Vampire Survivors on Switch, PC, Xbox, and Mobile RIGHT NOW! PlayStation coming soon!

Tim and Roger talk about all the leaks before Summer Game Fest. Also Astro Bot has a price! 60 bucks!! Let's talk about it.
